title: Show 75 - John Swinney (LIVE)
itunes:title: Show 75 - John Swinney (LIVE)

description:
John Swinney John is a former leader of the SNP and is currently Deputy First Minister of Scotland and the Cabinet Secretary for Education and Skills. Thoughtful and reflective, he is popular across the political spectrum. He talks to Matt about what made him join the SNP instead of other parties, the emotional side of politics and reveals who he wanted to win the World Cup...

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
